episodes.synopsis: In Chile, Shaun visits an Air Force base that experienced one of the country's foremost UFO sightings; later he explores a UFO hot spot in the Andes.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A top ufologist takes Shaun to see a massive alien-like geoglypth, the Atacama Giant, in Chile’s Atacama Desert. Witnesses share astonishing tales.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Shaun explores a sighting that occurred over a British RAF base and visits members of a spiritual movement who worship extraterrestrials.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: In England, Shaun meets America's most famous abductee and others who have encountered extraterrestrials, and visits the site of a famous UFO case.
episodes.title: Episode 4

video.title: Shaun Ryder on UFOs
video.synopsis: UFO fanatic Shaun Ryder of The Happy Mondays hosts this far-out series that explores some of the mysteries surrounding extraterrestrial encounters.
